channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 4 – NYC (Updated)
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Unfortunately I still feel pretty bad. Going tto stay in the hostel until I have to go to JFK for my flight to Canada.
Thanks for the positive feedback.I appreciate it :)
item.content:encoded:
Unfortunately I still feel pretty bad. Going tto stay in the hostel until I have to go to JFK for my flight to Canada.

Thanks for the positive feedback.I appreciate it :)

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: I hope u feel better already. Keep posting, it's great to read you every morning :)
item.content:encoded: I hope u feel better already. Keep posting, it’s great to read you every morning :)
